page.title: 12Old Dalby Cricket Club.
page.content: The cricket pavilion used to be an old cow shed but there is now a new one. The cricket field is part of the Community Field next to the primary school playing field.The captain of the club is Simon Powell.The players come from the villages around Old Dalby.The matches are played against other villages.At the end of the season they always play Central Television.The teas are made by the wives of the cricketers.They are usually cobs filled with salad, sandwiches with cheese or chicken, and cakes.The teams also have a drink.
